mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_stock ( ust_classify, ust_code, ust_name, ust_sale_cost, ust_sale_cnt, ust_sale_total, ust_stock_cnt, ust_comment, ust_status, ust_delete, user_id, insert_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{ustClassify}, #{ustCode}, #{ustName}, #{ustSaleCost}, #{ustSaleCnt}, #{ustSaleTotal}, #{ustStockCnt}, #{ustComment}, '0', '0', #{userId}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_stock SET ust_classify = #{ustClassify}, ust_sale_cost = #{ustSaleCost}, ust_sale_cnt = #{ustSaleCnt}, ust_sale_total = #{ustSaleTotal}, ust_comment = #{ustComment}, update_time = now() WHERE ust_no = #{ustNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND ust_delete = '0'
